title: Emerson Plans to Merge Industrial-Software Businesses With AspenTech
sub_head: Cash-and-stock deal would value AspenTech at around $160 a share
body:
Emerson Electric Co. plans to merge two of its software businesses with Aspen Technology Inc. in a roughly $11 billion deal aimed at capturing growing demand for industrial technology.
The cash-and-stock transaction would value AspenTech, as the company is known, at around $160 a share, officials from the companies said. AspenTechâ€™s shareholders would receive $87 and 0.42 share of the combined company for each share they currently own. The transaction is expected to be announced Monday.
